gui.autoclicky.delayTooltip: Delay between clicks in ticks (1 tick = 50 ms)
gui.autoclicky.interrupt.tooltip: Interrupt the item use when attack
gui.autoclicky.messages.tooltip: Show autoclicky messages in action bar
gui.autoclicky.autoJump.tooltip: Autoclicky will jump when targeting an entity
gui.autoclicky.onlyEntity.tooltip: Autoclicky will only attack when targeting an entity
